en.description: Attacks allied Grineer troops; prevents the conversion of nearby Grineer into thralls

ru.description: Attacks allied Grineer troops; prevents the conversion of nearby Grineer into thralls

ko.description: Attacks allied Grineer troops; prevents the conversion of nearby Grineer into thralls

zh-hant.description: 會攻擊附近的Grineer盟友，防止其轉化為奴僕。如果已經發生轉化，赤毒巫妖會偶爾攻擊玩家

zh-hans.description: 会攻击附近的Grineer盟友，防止其转化为仆从。如果已经发生转化，赤毒玄骸会偶尔攻击玩家
